# content

**Instance Property**

The content of the list item.

## Declaration

```swift
var content: DocumentObservation.Container { get }
```

## Inspecting an item

- **itemString**: The transcript of the list item, excluding the list marker.
- **markerString**: The list marker as a string.
- **markerType**: The style of the list marker.

items.description: The transcript of the list item, excluding the list marker.
